text: 24:49 Aisaia 44:3; Joel 2:28; Jon 14:16; 14:26; 15:26; 16:7; Aposel 1:4Ia oragh. Afeziam faragha akam akɨra ghaze, a uan Duam isɨ ia danɨngam. Ezɨ kɨ a mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, ia bagh anemangam. Kamaghɨn ia nguibar ekiamɨn ikɨ. Egh mamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨ dughiar God ko itir gavgavim izighirɨtɨma, ia a iniam.”
